foodList.description: Egg fried rice with drumstick along with some vegetable for a healthier meal.

foodList.name: Beef Fried Rice

foodList.description: Spaghetti noodle with ground beef and tomato sauce with some cheese.

foodList.description: Grilled lamb steak with vegetable, eat along with bread.

foodList.name: Crocodile Steak
foodList.description: Grilled crocodile steak with vegetable, eat along with bread.

foodList.name: Diced Beef

foodList.description: Pork and broccoli stir-fry.

foodList.description: Mixing chickpeas into the rice and adding extra vegetables

foodList.description: A healthy meal, stir-frying a lot of different kinds of vegetable.

foodList.name: Lobster Rolls
foodList.description: A dish native to New England, made of lobster meat served on a grilled hot dog-style bun.

foodList.name: Lobster Thermidor
foodList.description: Lobster shells are stuffed with cooked lobster in a creamy white wine sauce, then topped with Parmesan cheese and broiled until golden.

foodList.name: Fried Salmon
foodList.description: Salmon together with torn lettuce, watercress, dipping sauce and lemon wedges.

foodList.name: Squid Stir-Fry
foodList.description: The squid tubes are scored to create grooves, which grab onto the sauce better. It is briefly marinated with Shaoxing wine to eliminate any fishy taste.

foodList.name: Ebi Fry
foodList.description: A Japanese fried shrimp made with succulent shrimp coated with Panko breadcrumbs and fried till golden brown.

foodList.name: Fish Fingers
foodList.description: Small oblong piece of minced fish coated in breadcrumbs and fried.
